title: Battle Bundle – Year 8 Season 3 – FOR HONOR
description:
The Vikings share legends of Gudmundr and how his shield and sword endure to protect Valkenheim.

The For Honor Y8S3 Battle Bundle gives you access to 100 tiers of rewards and instantly unlocks 25 tiers of your progression. Also included is the Y4S3 Legacy Pass with 101 tiers of returning and retrofitted rewards for all heroes to date. Available during Y8S3 only.
longDescription:
The Vikings share legends of Gudmundr and how his shield and sword endure to protect Valkenheim. Honor the fallen Jarl Gudmundr with a Viking funeral in the Y8S1 Battle Bundle. It gives you access to 100 tiers of progression rewards for both Battle and Legacy Pass for all 35 heroes, including:

-Instantly unlock the next 25 tiers in your current progression
-1 execution, weapon set, and paired emote (per hero)
-2 battle outfits and effects (per hero)
-Various customization elements
-A 10% bonus in battle points earned through completed matches
-Legacy Pass tier 101 for retrofitted rewards for all heroes released after Y4S3 to date
-And more!

The For Honor Y8S3 Battle Bundle is available until December 5, 2024, and is not eligible for refund.
